headline: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Story For Union Pacific (UNP)
summary: Union Pacific is back in focus after analysts revised their price target, signaling a fresh look at what the market might be willing to pay for the stock. This change in target reflects updated expectations about the company based on recent developments and commentary around its outlook. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on top of these evolving price targets and the story behind them. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full story. Head over to our Company Report to find new ways...

headline: This is Why  Union Pacific (UNP) is a Great Dividend Stock
summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does Union Pacific (UNP) have what it takes? Let's find out.

headline: Union Pacific (UNP) Valuation Check After Record 2025 Profit On Slightly Lower Revenue
summary: Union Pacific (UNP) just posted fourth quarter and full year 2025 results that combined slightly lower revenue with higher profit, putting the railroad's income profile and efficiency firmly in focus for shareholders. See our latest analysis for Union Pacific. At a share price of US$232.55, Union Pacific has seen a 7.48% 90 day share price return, while the 1 year total shareholder return of a 4.44% decline contrasts with a 26.30% gain over five years. This points to momentum that has...

headline: Did Union Pacific’s (UNP) Record Profit and Earnings Miss Just Reframe Its Long‑Term Playbook?
summary: Union Pacific Corporation has released its fourth-quarter 2025 results, reporting revenue of US$6,085 million, slightly below the prior year, while net income rose to US$1,848 million and diluted earnings per share increased to US$3.11. The company coupled record full-year profit and operating metrics with a fourth quarter that missed analyst expectations on both revenue and earnings, highlighting the tension between long-term execution and short-term volume and margin pressures. Next, we...

headline: UNP Q4 Deep Dive: Margin Pressures and Merger Uncertainty Define the Quarter
summary: Freight transportation company Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) fell short of the markets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales flat year on year at $6.09 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.86 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.
